channel.title: Crypter on Exists4All
channel.description: Recent content in Crypter on Exists4All

item.title: How to create your own PE Crypter with C++ from scratch
item.description: In this tutorial I am going to explain how to create a smi PE Crypter in Windows using C++ with VS. This tutorial should be enough to get you going and make your own advanced obfuscation tools for PE files.
